item.title: Report E-2025030400
item.description:
Report E-2025030400

Identified by scraper @ 2025-03-27T15:24:19+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-02-26
  • City: SANTA FE SPRINGS
  • State: CA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS, LLC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: At 20:11 EST on 2/26, XPO-ULA contacted ERTS to report a spill of about 1 cup of "CARBOGUARD 893 - PART A" from a 1gal metal pail onto the trailer floor. The pail was loaded damaged by BCA. ERTS reviewed the SDS with the caller who felt comfortable cleaning the spill with terminal-issued PPE. ERTS generated waste ID: 228860-1

item.title: Report E-2025030387
item.description:
Report E-2025030387

Identified by scraper @ 2025-03-26T21:14:02+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-02-25
  • City: BLYTHE
  • State: CA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS, LLC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: At 0831 ET, XPO notified ERTS of a cargo release at terminal UBY. It was reported that approximately 1 gallon of Weld all primer 8151 released from 1 gallon metal pail and 2 others 1-gallon pails were impacted due to forklift puncture. The release impacted door 55. ERTS reviewed the SDS with the caller and determined that terminal personnel are capable of cleaning the release with PPE available on site. The terminal used a 25-gallon metal drum for the waste. The remainder will continue to the consignee.

Report E-2025030317

  • Incident Date: 2025-02-18
  • City: CARSON
  • State: CA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS, LLC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 6500
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: At 1532 ET, XPO notified ERTS of a cargo release at terminal ULB. It was reported that approximately 1 quart of UN2735 released from 1 55-gallon metal drum due to shipper packing. The release impacted trailer # 3234086. Contractors confirmed approximately 1 qt of product leaked from a loose bung cap, impacted the pallet wood and drum itself. They tightened the bung cap and overpacked it as a precaution.
